TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit CryptoStream extends System.IO.Stream implements class System.IDisposable
type CryptoStream = class inherit Stream interface IDisposable

summary.span: 定义将数据流链接到加密转换的流。

span.span: Defines a stream that links data streams to cryptographic transformations.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 公共语言运行时使用面向流的设计来进行加密。The common language runtime uses a stream-oriented design for cryptography. 此设计的核心是。The core of this design is . 实现的任何加密对象均可与实现的任何对象链接在一起, 以便可以将一个对象的流出输出送入另一个对象的输入中。Any cryptographic objects that implement can be chained together with any objects that implement , so the streamed output from one object can be fed into the input of another object. 中间结果 (第一个对象的输出) 无需单独存储。The intermediate result (the output from the first object) does not need to be stored separately. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此类型实现接口。This type implements the interface. 使用完类型后, 应通过调用方法来直接或间接地释放该类型, 而该方法又会调用其实现。When you have finished using the type, you should dispose of it either directly or indirectly by calling its method, which in turn calls its implementation. 若要直接释放类型, 请`try` / `catch`在块中调用其方法。To dispose of the type directly, call its method in a `try`/`catch` block. 若要间接释放类型，请使用 `using`（在 C# 中）或 `Using`（在 Visual Basic 中）等语言构造。To dispose of it indirectly, use a language construct such as `using` (in C#) or `Using` (in Visual Basic). 有关详细信息, 请参阅接口主题中的 "使用实现 IDisposable 的对象" 一节。For more information, see the "Using an Object that Implements IDisposable" section in the interface topic. 在使用完对象后, 应始终通过调用方法来显式关闭该对象。You should always explicitly close your object after you are done using it by calling the method. 这样做会刷新基础流, 并导致对象处理所有剩余的数据块。Doing so flushes the underlying stream and causes all remaining blocks of data to be processed by the object. 但是, 如果在调用方法之前发生异常, 则该对象可能不会关闭。However, if an exception occurs before you call the method, the object might not be closed. 若要确保始终调用方法, 请将对方法的调用置于`catch`语句的`finally`块`try` /内。To ensure that the method always gets called, place your call to the method within the `finally` block of a `try`/`catch` statement. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用对字符串进行加密。The following example demonstrates how to use a to encrypt a string. 此方法使用具有指定向量 () 和初始化向量() 的类。This method uses class with the specified and initialization vector (). [!code-csharp[Cryptography.Rijndael.Create.File#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/cryptography.rijndael.create.file/cs/fileexample.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Cryptography.Rijndael.Create.File#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/cryptography.rijndael.create.file/vb/fileexample.vb#1)]

summary.span: 释放由 使用的所有资源。

span.span: Releases all resources used by the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法包装对类型的实现的调用。This method wraps a call to the type's implementation. 调用`Dispose`会允许出于其他目的重新分配所使用的资源。Calling `Dispose` allows the resources used by the to be reallocated for other purposes. 有关的详细信息`Dispose`, 请参阅[清理非托管资源](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md)For more information about `Dispose`, see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md)

summary.span: 释放由 占用的非托管资源，还可以另外再释放托管资源。

span.span: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the and optionally releases the managed resources.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法由公共`Dispose()`方法`Finalize`和方法调用。This method is called by the public `Dispose()` method and the `Finalize` method. `Dispose()`调用受保护`Dispose(Boolean)`的方法, 释放参数设置为`true`。`Dispose()` invokes the protected `Dispose(Boolean)` method with the disposing parameter set to `true`. `Finalize` 将释放设置为 `Dispose`，调用 `false`。`Finalize` invokes `Dispose` with disposing set to `false`. 当 `disposing` 参数为 `true` 时，此方法释放该 引用的、由任何托管对象持有的全部资源。When the `disposing` parameter is `true`, this method releases all resources held by any managed objects that this references. 此方法调用每个引用对象的 `Dispose()` 方法。This method invokes the `Dispose()` method of each referenced object.

para.span: 可以由其他对象多次调用。

span.span: can be called multiple times by other objects.

para.span: 重写时, 请注意不要引用先前在调用时已释放的对象。

span.span: When overriding , be careful not to reference objects that have been previously disposed in an earlier call to .

para.span: 有关如何实现的详细信息, 请参阅[实现 Dispose 方法](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md)。

span.span: For more information about how to implement , see [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md).

para.span: 有关 和的详细信息, 请参阅[清理非托管资源](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md)。

span.span: For more information about and , see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md).

.method public hidebysig virtual instance void Flush() cil managed
Public Overrides Sub Flush ()
public: override void Flush();
override this.Flush : unit -> unit

summary.span: 清理当前流的所有缓冲区，并使所有缓冲数据写入基础设备。

span.span: Clears all buffers for the current stream and causes any buffered data to be written to the underlying device.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 除非显式调用或, 否则刷新流将不会刷新其基础编码器。Flushing the stream will not flush its underlying encoder unless you explicitly call or . 如果设置`true`为, 则表示将数据从缓冲区刷新到流, 但不会刷新编码器状态。Setting to `true` means that data will be flushed from the buffer to the stream, but the encoder state will not be flushed. 这允许编码器保留其状态 (部分字符), 以使其能够正确编码下一个字符块。This allows the encoder to keep its state (partial characters) so that it can encode the next block of characters correctly. 此方案影响 UTF8 和 UTF7, 其中某些字符只能在编码器接收到相邻字符后编码。This scenario affects UTF8 and UTF7 where certain characters can only be encoded after the encoder receives the adjacent character or characters. > [!NOTE] > 应调用方法或方法来完成刷新缓冲区。You should call either the method or the method to complete flushing the buffer.

span.span: Cryptographic Services

summary.span: 异步清理当前流的所有缓冲区，并使所有缓冲数据写入基础设备，并且监控取消请求。

span.span: Clears all buffers for the current stream asynchronously, causes any buffered data to be written to the underlying device, and monitors cancellation requests.

returns.span: 表示异步刷新操作的任务。

span.span: A task that represents the asynchronous flush operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 必须 C#通过 ()或`Await` (Visual Basic) 运算符将对的调用推迟到任务完成后, 才能暂停执行方法。 `await`You must preface your call to with the `await` (C#) or `Await` (Visual Basic) operator to suspend execution of the method until the task is complete. 有关详细信息，请参阅[使用 Async 和 Await 的异步编程](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/db854f91-ccef-4035-ae4d-0911fde808c7)。For more information, see [Asynchronous Programming with Async and Await](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/db854f91-ccef-4035-ae4d-0911fde808c7). 如果在操作完成前取消该操作, 则返回的任务包含 属性的值。If the operation is canceled before it completes, the returned task contains the value for the property.

span.span: The stream has been disposed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 必须 C#通过 ()或`Await` (Visual Basic) 运算符将对的调用推迟到任务完成后, 才能暂停执行方法。 `await`You must preface your call to with the `await` (C#) or `Await` (Visual Basic) operator to suspend execution of the method until the task is complete. 有关详细信息，请参阅[使用 Async 和 Await 的异步编程](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/db854f91-ccef-4035-ae4d-0911fde808c7)。For more information, see [Asynchronous Programming with Async and Await](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/db854f91-ccef-4035-ae4d-0911fde808c7). 如果在操作完成前取消该操作, 则返回的任务包含 属性的值。If the operation is canceled before it completes, the returned task contains the value for the property.
